name: Escape Artist (itch) (Adrian, razorxtrmz, Franked96)
description:
Created a game in UE4 with some friends who are participating in a jam for the first time with the main focus on learning x) 

Controls  :
Normal PC character controls, WASD + Space.
Goal  :
Escape the ancient dungeon and dodge traps while making your way to the exit, simple right? Go grab your freedom!Team  :
Razor - 3D Artist attempting his first jam!
Frank - 3D Artist trying a jam for the first time! also jammed and created a simple background soundtrack too!
Adrian - Experienced Unity dev, Learning and creating a game in UE4! External Assets  :
Mixamo used for the main characters Run and Idle animations.
cc0 Lava Texture
